title: Student FAQs at Bard College

cleaned_text: Resources for Students Vaccination Testing Student Life Important Contacts For individual questions please contact the following directly: - Testing: Health Services, 845-758-7433, [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#6d1f081e01040b082d0f0c1f0943080918) - Student [Student Support page](https://www.bard.edu/covid19/students/support/)for more contacts.
